hostname dev3
!
version 16.12
!
vlan 23,34
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 switchport
 switchport access vlan 23
 switchport mode access
 spanning-tree portfast
 no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 switchport
 switchport access vlan 34
 switchport mode access
 spanning-tree portfast
 no shutdown
!
interface Vlan23
 ip address 10.23.0.3 255.255.255.0
 no ip redirects
 no shutdown
!
interface Vlan34
 ip address 10.34.0.3 255.255.255.0
 no ip redirects
 no shutdown
!
ip route 10.12.0.0 255.255.255.0 10.23.0.2
ip route 10.45.0.0 255.255.255.0 10.34.0.4
!
end
